example.text: At midnight, Title 42 will end. This is law enforcement's last effective tool to stop floods of illegal immigrants crossing our border. The border crisis didn't need to happen - President Biden's relentless pursuit of open border policies has left our border open and porous. ?

The State Department's delays of passport applications have frustrated my constituents in #TN03 and Americans nationwide. I joined a bipartisan letter to [[user]] asking for answers about why these delays are happening and what they're doing to fix the backlog. [[url]]

When I was the top Republican on the Homeland Security Subcommittee of [[user]], I secured nearly $2 billion to restart construction on the Border Wall. Biden refuses to use the money to build the Wall.

At midnight, Title 42 will end. This is law enforcement's last effective tool to stop floods of illegal immigrants crossing our border. The border crisis didn't need to happen - President Biden's relentless pursuit of open border policies has left our border open and porous. ?
[[user]] has a plan to secure our borders and end Biden's and DC Democrats' open border policies. HR 2, the ? ?????????? ?, is the strongest border security bill the American People have ever seen.
